amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 118-656 to add to the annual report an assessment on the economic loss to the United States as a result of hacking and trade secret theft by the Chinese Communist Party.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
